task: Add or remove a tab stop
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'View' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Show' group, check the 'Ruler' option to display the ruler if it's not already visible.
Place the cursor in the paragraph where you want to add or remove a tab stop.
Click on the location on the ruler where you want to add or remove the tab stop.
To add a tab stop, click on the 'Tab' button on the left side of the ruler. Choose the desired tab alignment from the drop-down menu.
To remove a tab stop, click and drag the tab stop off the ruler.
Repeat steps 5-7 to add or remove additional tab stops as needed.
Save the document to apply the changes.
